          <title>
            <string language="fr">Orbite due à la pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit due to gravity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn wegen der Schwerkraft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita  devido à gravidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orbita dovuto gravità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροχιά λόγω στη βαρύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Órbita  debido a la gravedad</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre l'orbite d'un plus petit  corps autour d'un plus grand corps dû à la force de la pesanteur.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the orbit of a smaller body around a larger body due to the force of gravity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Force</string>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Isaac Newton</string>
            <string language="en">Isaac Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bahn eines kleineren 
Körpers um einen größeren Körper wegen der Kraft von Schwerkraft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a órbita de um corpo 
menor em torno de um corpo maior  devido à força da gravidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'orbita di più 
piccolo corpo intorno ad un più grande corpo dovuto la forza di 
gravità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την τροχιά ενός 
μικρότερου σώματος γύρω από ένα μεγαλύτερο σώμα λόγω στη 
δύναμη της βαρύτητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la órbita de un cuerpo
más pequeño alrededor de un cuerpo más grande  debido a la fuerza 
de la gravedad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
